title: Strengthening Business Competency: Online Education Quality Assessment Expert Course Based on the PDCA Cycle

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in online education platforms and experience in mathematics instruction
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Design a quality indicator system for online math education by applying the four stages of the PDCA cycle (Plan-Do-Check-Act)
Establish action plans for course improvement using three or more quality assessment tools in mobile learning environments
Complete one project-based assessment task through collaboration with peer evaluators and provide quality improvement recommendations
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
